lemma ovalidNF_owhile_inv[wp]: assumes "\<And>r s. ovalidNF (\<lambda>s'. I r s' \<and> C r s' \<and> s' = s) (B r) (\<lambda>r' s'. I r' s' \<and> (r', r) \<in> R)" and "wf R" and "\<And>r s. I r s \<Longrightarrow> \<not> C r s \<Longrightarrow> Q r s" shows "ovalidNF (I r) (owhile_inv C B r I R) Q"
